title: Hybrid Physical-Virtual Laboratory Design: Application to Water Treatment Processes

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental engineering concepts and understanding of water treatment processes
context.additional_context: For undergraduate students in technical professions, implementation of blended physical/virtual laboratory learning through mobile-based microlearning in a BYOD environment. Learning outcomes are measured via project-based assessment.

learning_goals: Able to compare and explain the complementary characteristics of physical and virtual laboratories
Enhance conceptual and material practice abilities in water treatment processes (jar testing) through blended-mode experimental design
Prepare and present project reports based on data collection and analysis results from different experimental modes

resources: Laboratory equipment (self-test kits, pH meters, etc.)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
